titles.title: To amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to require plans for achieving self-support to include a career or housing goal.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2073)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to require plans for achieving self-support to include a career or housing goal.
